To make a strong coffee, put two spoon fulls of grounds in the middle of a 
coffee filter.  Then bring the edges of the filter together to make a bag 
and hold it shut with a metal binder clip.  Boil the coffee bag in about 2 
liters of water for half an hour.﻿
